mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_NUM, ADMIN_NICK, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW from tbl_admin where admin_id = #{adminId} and admin_pw = #{adminPw}
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUM) FROM tbl_USER
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUM) FROM tbl_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR USER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUM) FROM tbl_USER WHERE USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F'
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUM) FROM tbl_USER WHERE USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T'
SELECT COUNT(BLACKLIST_NUM) FROM tbl_BLACKLIST

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' ELSE 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'üèÖ' ELSE '-' END AS badge, USER_MONITOR AS userMonitor, USER_JOIN_DATE AS userJoinDate FROM TBL_USER ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' ELSE 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'üèÖ' ELSE '-' END AS badge, USER_MONITOR AS userMonitor, USER_JOIN_DATE AS userJoinDate FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' ELSE 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'üèÖ' ELSE '-' END AS badge, USER_MONITOR AS userMonitor, USER_JOIN_DATE AS userJoinDate FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Í∞úÎ∞ú' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Î≥¥Ïïà' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'ÏûêÍ≤©Ï¶ù' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Í∞úÎ∞ú' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Î≥¥Ïïà' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARTICLE_NUM, A.ARTICLE_TAGNAME AS articleTagName, A.ARTICLE_TITLE AS articleTitle, U.USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' WHEN U.USER_MENTO_CERT = 'F' THEN 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, A.ARTICLE_DATE AS articleDate, A.ARTICLE_VIEW AS articleView FROM TBL_ARTICLE A JOIN TBL_USER U ON A.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE A.ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'ÏûêÍ≤©Ï¶ù' AND A.ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏' ORDER BY A.ARTICLE_DATE DESC ) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notice (notice_num, notice_category, notice_title, notice_text, notice_view, notice_date, admin_num) VALUES (seq_notice.nextVal, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeText}, 0, sysdate, #{adminNum})
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_num, a.article_Title, a.article_text, a.article_Date, a.article_TopCate, a.article_BotCate, a.article_tagname, a.article_view, a.ARTICLE_MONITOR_NUM, u.user_num, u.user_nick, u.user_monitor FROM TBL_ARTICLE a INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON a.user_num = u.user_num WHERE article_num = #{articleNum}

SELECT C.COMMENT_NUM, C.USER_NUM, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_NICK, C.COMMENT_TEXT, C.COMMENT_MONITOR_NUM, C.COMMENT_DATE, U.USER_MONITOR AS USER_MONITOR, U.user_nick FROM TBL_COMMENT C JOIN TBL_USER U ON C.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM WHERE C.ARTICLE_NUM = #{articleNum} ORDER BY C.COMMENT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BLACKLIST (BLACKLIST_NUM, BLACKLIST_COMMENT, BLACKLIST_DATE, BLACKLIST_NAME, BLACKLIST_ID, BLACKLIST_RELEASEDATE, BLACKLIST_ISBLACK) VALUES (SEQ_BLACKLIST.NEXTVAL, #{blackListComment}, #{blackListDate}, #{blackListName}, #{blackListId}, #{blackListReleaseDate}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NUM, U.USER_NICK, U.USER_MONITOR, U.USER_MENTO_CERT, U.USER_CAREER, T.CERTS_IPE, T.CERTS_IPIE, T.CERTS_IPT, T.CERTS_ISE, T.CERTS_ISIE, T.CERTS_NETMANAGER1, T.CERTS_NETMANAGER2, T.CERTS_SQLD, T.CERTS_LINUXMASTER1, T.CERTS_LINUXMASTER2, COUNT(DISTINCT A.ARTICLE_NUM) AS ARTICLE_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT C.COMMENT_NUM) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM TBL_USER U LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTICLE A ON U.USER_NUM = A.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON U.USER_NUM = C.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TBL_CERTS T ON U.USER_NUM = T.USER_NUM WHERE U.USER_NICK = #{userNick} GROUP BY U.USER_NUM, U.USER_NICK, U.USER_MONITOR, U.USER_MENTO_CERT, U.USER_CAREER, T.CERTS_IPE, T.CERTS_IPIE, T.CERTS_IPT, T.CERTS_ISE, T.CERTS_ISIE, T.CERTS_NETMANAGER1, T.CERTS_NETMANAGER2, T.CERTS_SQLD, T.CERTS_LINUXMASTER1, T.CERTS_LINUXMASTER2
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Í∞úÎ∞ú' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏'
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'ÏûêÍ≤©Ï¶ù' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏'
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Î≥¥Ïïà' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÏßàÎ¨∏'
SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_NUM) FROM tbl_NOTICE
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Í∞úÎ∞ú' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ'
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'ÏûêÍ≤©Ï¶ù' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ'
SELECT COUNT(Article_NUM) FROM tbl_ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_TOPCATE = 'Î≥¥Ïïà' AND ARTICLE_BOTCATE = 'ÍøÄÌåÅ'
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_CERTS
CERTS_IPE = 'T', CERTS_IPE = 'F',
CERTS_IPIE = 'T', CERTS_IPIE = 'F',
CERTS_IPT = 'T', CERTS_IPT = 'F',
CERTS_ISE = 'T', CERTS_ISE = 'F',
CERTS_ISIE = 'T', CERTS_ISIE = 'F',
CERTS_NETMANAGER1 = 'T', CERTS_NETMANAGER1 = 'F',
CERTS_NETMANAGER2 = 'T', CERTS_NETMANAGER2 = 'F',
CERTS_SQLD = 'T', CERTS_SQLD = 'F',
CERTS_LINUXMASTER1 = 'T', CERTS_LINUXMASTER1 = 'F',
CERTS_LINUXMASTER2 = 'T', CERTS_LINUXMASTER2 = 'F',
WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}
UPDATE TBL_USER SET USER_MENTO_CERT = CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'F' ELSE 'T' END WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT, NOTICE_VIEW, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE notice_Num = #{noticeNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'Î©òÌÜ†' ELSE 'ÏùºÎ∞ò' END AS grade, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NICK AS userNick, CASE WHEN USER_MENTO_CERT = 'T' THEN 'üèÖ' ELSE '-' END AS badge, USER_MONITOR AS userMonitor, USER_JOIN_DATE AS userJoinDate FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR USER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_comment SET COMMENT_TEXT= '(Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÏûêÏóê ÏùòÌï¥ ÏÇ≠Ï†úÎêú ÎåìÍ∏ÄÏûÖÎãàÎã§)' WHERE COMMENT_NUM = #{commentNum}
